summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of VoyCargo 2026 pricing updates completed. Verified all Santiago pricing is correct, found critical region switching bug for Concepción Marítimo, confirmed premium design elements and mobile responsiveness are working properly.

ui_bugs.issue: Concepción Marítimo shows Santiago prices instead of correct Concepción prices
ui_bugs.details: When switching to Concepción + Marítimo, all box prices still show Santiago values (S=$44.990 vs expected $56.990, etc.) and hero card shows 'Santiago (Región Metropolitana)' instead of 'Concepción (Región del Biobío)'

integration_issues.issue: JavaScript not properly updating Marítimo pricing when Concepción region is selected
integration_issues.root_cause: renderPricing function may not be handling Concepción Marítimo data correctly

passed_tests: Santiago Aéreo specials correct: Celulares=$15.990, Electrónicos=$15.990, Docs=$12.990, Meds=$12.990, TV=$11.990
Santiago Marítimo box prices correct: S=$44.990, M=$54.990, L=$67.990, XL=$142.990, XG=$162.990, XXL=$225.990
Santiago Marítimo combo prices correct: S+S=$85.990, M+M=$105.990, L+L=$129.990, XL+XL=$279.990, XG+XG=$319.990, XXL+XXL=$444.990
Concepción Aéreo prices correct: $15.990/kg, Celulares=$18.990, Docs=$14.990
Region tabs switch correctly (Santiago/Concepción buttons work)
Service type tabs switch correctly (Aéreo/Marítimo buttons work)
Premium design elements render: hero cards, animated rate cards, gradient backgrounds, shadows
Premium icons display correctly in all pricing sections
Quote form validation and calculation works correctly (tested 5kg Aéreo = $69.950)
WhatsApp integration working: floating button and form submission links functional
Mobile responsive design: menu toggle works, desktop nav hides, layouts adapt properly
Page loads correctly with proper hero section, navigation, and all sections
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Concepción Marítimo pricing bug: Update JavaScript renderPricing() function to properly load Concepción Marítimo prices instead of showing Santiago prices. Verify preciosData.concepcion.maritimo is being used correctly when both Concepción region and Marítimo service are selected.
